#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int dp[51][51];
int solve(string s, int i,int n)
{
    if(i>n)
        return dp[n][i]=0;
    /*cout<<"solve:(";
    for(int j=i;j<=n;j++)
        cout<<s[j];
    cout<<","<<i<<","<<n<<")";*/
    if(i==n)
    {
        //cout<<"=1"<<endl;
        return dp[n][i]=1;
    }
    /*else
        cout<<endl;*/
    if(dp[n][i]!=-1)
        return dp[n][i];
    int ans=solve(s,i+1,n)+solve(s,i,n-1)-solve(s,i+1,n-1);
    if(s[i]==s[n])
        ans+=1+solve(s,i+1,n-1);
    /*cout<<"solve:(";
    for(int j=i;j<=n;j++)
        cout<<s[j];
    cout<<","<<i<<","<<n<<")="<<ans<<endl;*/
    return dp[n][i]=ans;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    string s;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s;
        memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
        printf("%d\n",solve(s,0,s.size()-1));
    }
}
